sanskritShlok: यं हि न व्यथयन्त्येते पुरुषं पुरुषर्षभ।
englishShlok: He who is not disturbed by the material senses, who remains unaffected by pain or pleasure, is a true yogi.
hindiMeaning: जो व्यक्ति भौतिक इंद्रियों से परेशान नहीं होता, जो दुख और सुख से अप्रभावित रहता है, वही सच्चा योगी है।
englishMeaning: A person who remains unaffected by the material world, and is undisturbed by pain and pleasure, is a true yogi.

sanskritShlok: न हि देहभृता शक्यं त्यक्तुं कर्माण्यशेषतः।
englishShlok: A person who is embodied cannot renounce all action, but can renounce the attachment to the results of action.
hindiMeaning: जो व्यक्ति शरीर में बंधा है, वह सभी कर्मों को त्याग नहीं सकता, लेकिन कर्मों के परिणामों से आसक्ति को त्याग सकता है।
englishMeaning: A person cannot completely renounce all actions, but they can renounce the attachment to the results of those actions.

englishShlok: Whatever action a person performs with body, speech, and mind, let it be dedicated to the Supreme.
hindiMeaning: जो भी कार्य व्यक्ति शरीर, वाणी और मन से करता है, उसे परमात्मा को समर्पित करें।
englishMeaning: All actions performed by body, speech, or mind should be dedicated to the divine.

englishShlok: A person who is unaffected by distress and unaffected by desire for pleasure, is considered a wise soul.
hindiMeaning: जो व्यक्ति दुखों से अप्रभावित रहता है और सुखों के लिए आसक्त नहीं होता, वह ज्ञानी आत्मा माना जाता है।
englishMeaning: A person who remains unaffected by sorrow and is free from attachment to pleasure is a wise soul.

sanskritShlok: योगस्थ: कुरु कर्माणि सङ्गं त्यक्त्वा धनञ्जय।
englishShlok: Perform your duties while being established in yoga, renouncing attachment, O Dhananjaya.
hindiMeaning: अपने कर्तव्यों को योग में स्थित होकर, आसक्ति को त्यागकर, हे धनञ्जय, पूरा करो।
englishMeaning: Perform your duties with equanimity, free from attachment, and stay grounded in yoga.

sanskritShlok: विवेक: प्रमाणं शास्त्रं कर्म केशव! योग का मार्ग दिखलाने वाला है।
englishShlok: Wisdom is the guiding light, O Keshava, and the scriptures are the authority for understanding the true path of yoga.
hindiMeaning: विवेक ही मार्गदर्शक है, हे केशव, और शास्त्र योग के सही मार्ग को दिखाने वाला है।
englishMeaning: Wisdom is the true guide, and scriptures are the authoritative source to understand the right path of yoga.

englishShlok: No one can remain without action even for a moment. Everyone is compelled to act according to their nature.
hindiMeaning: कोई भी व्यक्ति एक क्षण के लिए भी बिना कर्म किए नहीं रह सकता। सभी अपनी प्रकृति के अनुसार कर्म करने के लिए विवश होते हैं।
englishMeaning: No one can stay inactive even for a moment. Every being is compelled to act as per their nature.

englishShlok: O son of Kunti, the experiences of heat and cold, pleasure and pain, are fleeting and impermanent.
hindiMeaning: हे कुन्ती के पुत्र! ताप और शीत, सुख और दुःख, ये सभी क्षणिक और अस्थायी हैं।
englishMeaning: The sensations of heat and cold, joy and sorrow, are temporary and transient.

englishShlok: Renounce all actions to Me with a mind devoted to the self, and with the intellect focused on Me.
hindiMeaning: सभी कर्मों को मुझमें समर्पित करो, और अपने मन को आत्मा में निष्ठित रखो।
englishMeaning: Renounce all actions to the Divine, with your mind focused on the Self and intellect devoted to the Divine.

englishShlok: The person who remains unaffected by sorrow, joy, or delusion, and maintains self-awareness, is steadfast in their purpose.
hindiMeaning: जो व्यक्ति शोक, सुख, और मोह से अप्रभावित रहता है, और आत्मा की ओर जागरूक रहता है, वह अपने उद्देश्य में दृढ़ रहता है।
englishMeaning: One who remains unaffected by sorrow, pleasure, or delusion, and stays aware of the true self, is steadfast in their journey.

sanskritShlok: दैवी ह्येषा गुणमयी मम माया दुरत्यया।
englishShlok: This divine energy of Mine, consisting of the three gunas (qualities), is very difficult to overcome.
hindiMeaning: यह मेरी दैवी माया, जो तीन गुणों (सत्त्व, रजस, तमस) से बनी है, अत्यन्त कठिन है, लेकिन जो मेरी शरण में आता है, वह इसे पार कर सकता है।
englishMeaning: My divine energy, composed of the three qualities, is very difficult to overcome. However, those who surrender to Me can transcend it.

englishShlok: The self is the driver of the chariot, the body is the chariot, and the mind is the reins controlling the senses.
hindiMeaning: आत्मा रथी है, शरीर रथ है और मन उन इंद्रियों को नियंत्रित करने वाली लगाम है।
englishMeaning: The soul is the charioteer, the body is the chariot, and the mind is the reins controlling the senses.

englishShlok: Abandon all forms of righteousness and surrender unto Me alone, I will liberate you from all sins.
hindiMeaning: सभी धर्मों को छोड़कर केवल मेरी शरण में आओ, मैं तुम्हें सभी पापों से मुक्त कर दूँगा।
englishMeaning: Leave all forms of righteousness and surrender to Me alone. I will release you from all sins.

englishShlok: One should elevate oneself with one's own mind, and not degrade oneself.
hindiMeaning: व्यक्ति को अपने मन से स्वयं को उन्नत करना चाहिए, और स्वयं को अवनत नहीं करना चाहिए।
englishMeaning: One should raise themselves using their own mind and should not degrade themselves.

englishShlok: Those who understand yoga and self-realization are unaffected by joy and sorrow.
hindiMeaning: जो योग और आत्मा के ज्ञान को समझते हैं, वे सुख और दुख से अप्रभावित रहते हैं।
englishMeaning: Those who understand yoga and self-knowledge are beyond the dualities of joy and sorrow.

sanskritShlok: सर्वे सुखिन: सन्तु सर्वे सन्तु निरामय:।
englishShlok: May all beings be happy, may all beings be free from disease.
hindiMeaning: सभी प्राणियों को सुखी बनाएं, सभी को निरोग बनाएं।
englishMeaning: May all beings be happy, may all beings be free from illness.

englishShlok: Whatever action a person performs with body, speech, and mind, let it be dedicated to the Supreme.
hindiMeaning: जो भी कार्य व्यक्ति शरीर, वाणी और मन से करता है, उसे परमात्मा को समर्पित करें।
englishMeaning: All actions performed by body, speech, or mind should be dedicated to the divine.

sanskritShlok: यत्र योगेश्वर: कृष्णो यत्र पार्थो धनुर्धर:।
englishShlok: Where there is Lord Krishna, the master of yoga, and Arjuna, the supreme archer, there also surely will be victory, righteousness, and glory.
hindiMeaning: जहां योगेश्वर श्री कृष्ण हैं और वहां अर्जुन हैं, वहां निश्चित रूप से विजय, धर्म और सम्मान होगा।
englishMeaning: Wherever there is Lord Krishna, the master of yoga, and Arjuna, the supreme archer, there victory, righteousness, and glory will surely prevail.
